name: Hentai Girls - Anime Puzzle 18+
description:
By purchasing this game, you are contributing to the release of new parts! With new mechanics and amazing pictures.Instructions:You need to restore the image by swapping the bricks.Key Features: minimum price
cute girls and lots of nudity
original style and great picture quality
simple and fast levels
zooming (you can see every detail!)
gallery
two levels of difficulty (easy and difficult)
nice relaxing music
48 achievements: alphabet, numbers and different symbols (for Steam profile design)
In the near future: trading cards
backgrounds (for Steam profile design)
